page.title: 04The Carnival.
page.content: At a carnival people dress up and have great fun making up floats and learning where they should stand.They also collect money for different appeals like schools,lifeboats or cancer research.It is a lot of fun watching them go by as well as being in it. There used to be a carnival in Sutton some years ago but it was decided not to have one one year then recently they reintroduced it and now have one every year.{Mr Ash}has been chairman of the committee.We found out that he hires most of his costumes from{Skegness}but he makes his own as well.{Mr Ash}has been chairman for 2 years.He said that the parade is the best part and he likes the most. Everyone who is in the carnival gets a medallion to keep.
